entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is it correct way to check that interface is from .NET? #98072
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `AVX10` converged vector ISA #98069
  • `INumber.MinNumber` and `INumber.MaxNumber` return `NaN` in `Release` configuration #98068
  • [API Proposa]: Provide vector functions covering common "mask" checks #98055
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MultiplyAddEstimate #98053
    9.0.0
  • Json source generator compiler error using reserved property names and DefaultIgnoreCondition #98050
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: DefaultInitializeAttribute for out parameters in native marshallers #98049
    9.0.0
  • WasmStripILAfterAOT causes broken runtime/compiler - System.InvalidProgramException: Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program #98041
  • QuicConnection: Validate certificates asynchronously. #98039
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `JsonUnknownTypeHandling` setting for deserializing `object` to .NET primitive values #98038
    Future
  • [mt][browser] JsImportTaskEchoPendingResult fails #98035
  • `IBinaryInteger.RotateLeft/Right` implemented with `>>` #98030
  • Android: HttpClient POST request adds unwanted Content-Type header #98029
  • Incorrect decimal to double conversion for certain values with certain number of trailing zeros #98028
  • [mt][browser] `Wasm.Browser.EventPipe.Sample` fails #98026
  • [NativeAOT] Support InlineArray larger than 1Mb #98024
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 26 Regressions on 2/4/2024 5:39:31 PM #98042
  • .NET 9 createdump crashes while creating coredumps #98023
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 5 Regressions on 2/3/2024 12:19:35 AM #98044
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 2/5/2024 1:05:09 PM #98046
  • 20%+ throughput regression in goldilocks scenarios #98021
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AggregateRateLimiter #98017
  • NuGet.Configuration.NuGetConfigurationException : NuGet.Config is not valid XML #98014
  • AssemblySaveModuleBuilderTests.GetArrayMethodTest fails on 'release mono_interpreter linux x64 Debug' CI leg #98013

Closed

  • It looks like now all objects support IAgileObject interface, regression to .NET Framework #98071
  • ECDsa private key PKCS binary doesn't match the same key after X509Certificate2.CopyWithPrivateKey() (Windows) #97932
    Future
  • lldb dumpmt crashes against source-built .NET 7 on Fedora 37 #83699
    9.0.0
  • Fix underlying bug in Named Pipes preventing setting ReadMode after creation #98060
  • Massive performance downgrade when using latest .NET 8 linux runtime image caused by libssl3 #97727
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives brought up to par with Math and generic math interfaces #96451
    9.0.0
  • Constant vectors propagated incorrectly #93698
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ISimdVector<TSelf, T>.GetMatchCount() and .IndexOfFirstMatch() #94639
  • .NET 8 Genenerics runtime issue #97807
  • Proposal: allow marking native exports in NativeAOT as PRIVATE #98047
  • MSB4018 The "Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task.ValidateAssembliesTask" when building System.Runtime.sln in Visual Studio #98002
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.FetchOcspResponse_FirstInvalidThenValid test failure #97836
    9.0.0
  • Remove System.Text.Json & System.Diagnostic.DiagnositicSource as a dependency for newer TFM when it is provided by Framework #97938
  • [browser][mt] Changes broke dotnet build in Http solution #98000
    9.0.0
  • CA1854: Option to limit to concrete types only #97293
  • Build warning when compiling Mono on linux-x64 #97981
    9.0.0
  • CA1868: Option to limit to concrete types only #97294
  • QuicListener always listens on "ANY" endpoint ignoring QuicListenerOptions.ListenEndPoint config #92812
    9.0.0
  • Hashset.TrimExcess(int capacity) corrupts hashset data structure #97947
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] `JsImportTaskEchoPendingResult` fails #98032
  • can we re-open System.Text.Json deserializing of object[bool] does not produce boolean #29960 #97801
  • System.Text.Json.Serealization (JsonPropertyName) is not converting json properties to dto classes #96482
  • [Intrinsic] CompareEqual does not use the memory source instruction #11921
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Rounding helpers use wrong rounding algorithm #97922
  • [API Proposal] Add persist able AssemblyBuilder implementation #83988
    9.0.0
  • Build failure in RyuJIT for ARM64 #98009

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests for ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Bump $(SystemDataSqlClientVersion) to 4.8.6 #98065
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0] Bump $(SystemDataSqlClientVersion) to 4.8.6 #98064
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: stopping preference for ML CSE heuristic #98063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump $(MicrosoftBuildVersion) to 17.8.3 #98062
    needs-area-label
  • [workloads] Also process the win-arm64 android cross packs #98061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update branding to 8.0.3 #98059
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98058
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #98057
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.28 #98056
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Always assign edge likelihoods in fgIncorporateProfileData #98054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] dumpThreadsOnExit #98052
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Disable jiterpreter_do_jit_call to address issues with disabling Wasm EH on 8.0. #98051
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][mt] Improve blocking wait detection and tests #98045
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • Improve Math.Round, Math.ILogB, and do some minor cleanup of Half, Single, and Double #98040
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector ctors #98037
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Convert operand of newarr to native int when producing reverse P/Invoke array marshalling #98025
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some linux-arm test coverage #98022
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add internal nuget to package tasks, and targets for workload testing #98019
    arch-wasm
  • Improved uninitialized object creation performance #98016
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_ID_2A` to `SVE_JH_2A` #98015
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Move ManagedHost project for host tests to pre-built test asset #97894
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98001
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use PreferredRegOptionalOperand for HWIntrinsic nodes #98020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update resolveContract.targets #98043
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mt][browser] Block `Wasm.Browser.EventPipe.Sample` #98027
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove use of `NewHolder<>` as field. #97843
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Ensure `HashSet.TrimExcess()` does not change the count #97989
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Make OCSP stapling tests more stable #97979
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Fix a warning. #98018
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix yaml parser error on runtime-wasm-perf.yml #98005
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Update solution files #98033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix possible runaway mutex in ManagedWebSocket.ReceiveAsyncPrivate() #97911
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] Extend the blocking Wait test #98003
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Place vtable slots deemed final by analysis into sealed vtable #97951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Remove an llvm restriction which is not needed anymore. #97862
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    arch-arm32, os-linux, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [ARM] Use Math[F].Round implementation in managed code #97964
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix main build #98011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Round #97999
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][llvm] Remove more llvm restrictions. #97907
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Small SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • BitCast<TYP_REF>(TypeHandleToRuntimeTypeHandle(clsHandle)) => nongc obj #97955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Remove strtok, strtok_s, wcstok_s PAL APIs #98008
    area-VM-coreclr
  • STJ: Skip usage of indexer for KeyedCollection #97734
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate LSDA data in the object writer #97972
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete useless delegate virtual methods #97959
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Take into account the local involved in GT_SWITCH for resolution #97713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #98006
    area-Infrastructure
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [browser][MT] test GC #97970
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97883
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.17
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97884
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.28
  • [release/8.0-staging] Implement faster RSA key check #98010
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-linux, 8.0.3
  • [CI][browser] Limit parallelism for browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_AOT to fix hanging CI #97992
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97977
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement IList<T> on Enumerable.Cast<T> for IList #97956
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix TryParseBigIntegerHexOrBinaryNumberStyle #97995
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Zero-diff refactoring of LSSA #2509
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable `System.Runtime.Tests` in CI (for Browser) #2506
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When there's a compiler in the build tree, building the solution builds it twice, sometimes causing build errors #38575
  • .NET 9 SDK prints relative path for build artifacts (UX) #38552

Closed

  • dotnet 8 dotnet restore failed due to network problem: Connection reset by peer #38551
  • Unable to browse Artifactory package source in Visual Studio Package manager - HTTP response status 403 #38555
  • Ubuntu: `sudo apt install dotnet8` failed but success with 6 & 7. #38527
  • Dotnet test doesn't run separate TargetFrameworks in parallel #19147
    Backlog
  • Container tooling generates invalid application image when used with an OCI base image #35608
  • Unable to Publish .NET7 & .NET8 windows Azure Function App in windows 2022 server #38281
  • [Question]Prompt permission denied after update to 8.0 #38541

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #38588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #38586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.407 #38580
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.117 #38578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove high priority message from test target #38573
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Make the use of the Roslyn toolset package an opt-in #38568
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.3

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.128 #38576
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.420 #38577
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.314 #38579
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.103 #38581
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.201 #38582
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the more #nullable disable #38554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #38545
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run tests in different tfms in parallel #38569
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Make the use of the Roslyn toolset package an opt-in #38543
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Remove the #nullable disable directive #38406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • add tool list format option #37394
    Approved to merge, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Tools
  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Unified Build controls #38506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2371653 #38207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #38507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913
  • [Proposal] Forcing ConfigureAwait(false) on assembly level #2542
  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • ref struct interfaces updates #7911

Updated

  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Gold bars while editing code using compound assignment #71980
  • Roslyn LSP server is packaging more than it should #71978
  • Support more format string embedded langauges #71973
    Backlog
  • Compiler freeze with custom assembly attribute #71970

Closed

  • CS8846 | Analyzer says the switch expression does not handle all cases, but I say otherwise #71971

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP #71983
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Beef up type inferrer #71982
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix some comments in the Workspaces.MSBuild project file #71981
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only request the necessary document and project in GraphBuilder.PopulateMapsForFileInputNode #71977
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • CompilationOutputInfo.AssemblyPath should be a normalized path #71975
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Patterns: Expand non-negative sets when performing certain operations #71968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respond to VS LSP diagnostic breaking changes #71967
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify compilation tracking (part4) #71972
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bootstrap Framework should be CI only #71979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extract type to its own file. #71974
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking (part3) #71966
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking (part 2) #71964
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #71934
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Enable implicit primary constructor parameter capture analyzer #71905
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify compilation tracking #71963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make constructor with additional argument private #71965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Correct show behavior in IntelliSense page. #71857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ignore issue comments starting with "Looks like this PR hasn't been active for some time..." #53859
  • Intermediate MTLS certificates ignored by certificate authentication #53858
  • AddEndpointFilterFactory not working? #53855
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53848
  • ErrorBoundary not working with Blazor App with Interactive Auto #53840
  • Error: System.InvalidOperationException: Method calls cannot be formatted in InputNumber & InputTextArea #53834
  • HTTP POST and PUT requests fail with "The response ended prematurely" #53833
  • .NET 8 migration from WASM to Blazor Web App - environment not set correctly #53832
  • Error "InvalidOperationException: Sequence contains more than one matching element" in Swagger when using multiple [FromForm] parameters in Minimal API #53831
  • Unable to resolve service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.IHubContext`1[ xxx ]' while attempting to activate ' xxx '. #53830
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mapaction #53829

PullRequests

Created

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/6.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53851
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update yarn.msbuild #53850
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Update Yarn.msbuild #53849
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53846
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `dddb219` to `4872968` #53845
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #53774
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Correctly encode non-ASCII characters in redirect URL #53642
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4565741` to `4872968` #53847

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • When initializing SOS, `coreclr_initialize` sometimes fails with HR `0x80131022`, leading to "Unrecognized command" error for managed commands #4315
    9.0.0
  • Seg Fault with dotnet-dump on specific arm32 Linux device #4369
    9.0.0
  • Linux arm32 lldb dump debugging commands not working #4370
    9.0.0

Updated

  • Access Denied (5) #4464
  • [gcdump] objects are sometimes missing from Android dumps #4477
    9.0.0
  • `System.OutOfMemoryException` during installation `dotnet-sos`, `dotnet-symbol`, `dotnet-dump` for `linux-riscv64` #4495

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix dotnet-trace rundown default #4499

Updated

  • feat: dumphttp command initial implementation #4488

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Changing Grid.Row does not update layout until window is resized #20404
  • PanGestureRecognizer on Windows stops working when leaving View #20397
  • .NET MAUI Shell.PresentationMode="NotAnimated" not working on iOS #20394
  • FlyoutIcon does not show in alternate theme #20392
  • TopViewController.NavigationItem.SetLeftBarButtonItem not working in MAUI .net 8 #20391
  • Add IMediaPicker option that combines PickPhotoAsync and PickVideoAsync so user can select either #20390
  • When PickContactAsync() returns, it prevents other windows to show #20383
  • The issue with the MultiBinding converter does not work properly when changing the values. #20382
  • [iOS] Border with image is wrong rendering. #20381
  • Unexpected UI Disruption Upon Invoking .Focus() Method on DatePicker and TimePicker Controls with IsVisible Set to False #20380
  • FlexLayout.Grow="1" not respecting Frame WidthRequest for Frames with images inside them. #20379
  • Touch input doesn't work in MAUI.Blazor #20377
  • Hot Reload not working for FlexLayout. Forced layout updates not pushed to Android. #20375

Closed

  • MAUI Incorrect Theme when Resuming iOS App #20384
  • Seeking MAUI Migration Advice #20385
  • [Android] DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfoChanged does not work when auto rotate is off #15927
  • Partial Repost: MainWindow freeze after workaround for "Maui partial UI freeze, typing to fast or method takes time to process." #15939
  • Xamarin.UITest “iOSDeviceManager” will damage your computer. You should move it to the Bin #20364
  • Unable to connect to mac #19746
  • [MAUI][.NET8] ‘Review’ module jumps repeatedly when editing recipe page. #20126
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • Ignore SafeArea on templates and shell flyout item templates #20403
  • Some views need a few ms to finish animating #20401
  • Move Legacy ListViewDoesntFreezeApp to Appium #20400
  • [iOS] CharacterEncoding should be used instead of NSStringEncoding. #20398
    do-not-merge, megapipeline/main
  • Remove cleanup for CI Builds #20395
  • [net9.0] `dotnet format src/Core/src/Core.csproj` #20388
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix design time image converter #20374
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

  • [iOS] Remove a nullability error when using 17.2.8104 #20396

  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [net9.0] Update with main #20362
  • [net8.0] Update with main #20363
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20371

Updated

  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨

    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why isn't modelBuilder.Model.GetEntityTypes() returning all entities? #33013
  • `Select` projection with an (uncorrelated) subquery produces two separate SQL queries #33012
  • Update eShop code to show EF best practices #33011
  • [SqlClient] Update 8.0 to 5.1.5 #33010

Closed

  • Vulnerable transitive nuget packages #33009

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33017
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #33015

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Also catch type initialization errors when attempting to load types that might not exist #32941
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0] NuGet package readme files #32982
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • Update branding to 6.0.28 #33014
  • Update branding to 8.0.3 #33016
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #32897

Updated

  • Split SQL Server functional tests into two projects #32953

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • .NET 8.0 aarch64 not available on Fedora 39 nor Ubuntu 22.04 LTS #17922

PullRequests

Created

  • Eliminate System.CommandLine prebuilt package #18540
  • Enable overriding of the arcade cmake SDK in VMR #18539
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #18538
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18537
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #18536
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #18535
  • Update branding to 8.0.201 #18533
  • Update branding to 6.0.128 #18527
  • Skip checking out vmr branch except when syncing #18526
  • Use native tools and update VS #18525
  • Aspire patch for SSCA fix #18524
  • [DO NOT MERGE] [VMR] Try turning on all the cross builds #18521

Merged

  • Remove some unused properties #18534
  • Update branding to 6.0.420 #18528
  • Update branding to 7.0.117 #18529
  • Update branding to 7.0.314 #18530
  • Update branding to 7.0.407 #18531
  • Update branding to 8.0.103 #18532
  • Update artifacts baseline #18523
  • Update triggers in ci.yml #18520
  • Don't run vmr-scan.yml for PRs in ci.yml and treat main-ub as a main branch #18515
  • Support debug output in vmr-sync.ps1 #18516
  • Fix CROSSCOMPILE being set for non-cross Mono builds #18512
  • Move Mac VMR build to full build scope #18514
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18466
  • Add VMR unified build pipelines #18409

Updated

  • Add support for removing binaries #18541
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18334
    Branch Lockdown
  • [NO MERGE] Installer (Merge to SDK) - Changeset #17959
    DO NOT MERGE
  • Support for short stack builds. #18463
